text: Biosurveillance is an aspect of biodefense relating to the detection of biological threats, including bioterrorist threats. BioWatch is a US government program to detect biological agents present in the environment through a system of filters.https://fas.org/sgp/crs/terror/RL32152.html#_1_3 == References == Category:Surveillance Category:Terrorism Category:Biosecurity
title: Biosurveillance
